directions: Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt, pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine.  Cook on High for 8 hours, adding more water as needed.  Note: if more than 1 cup of water has evaporated during cooking, then the temperature is too high.
Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid.  Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain desired consistency.
ingredients: ½  fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped
1 ¾ teaspoons fresh ground black pepper
title: Refried Beans Without the Refry | Allrecipes
